html: Defiled—By the wickedness of its people. The laws—The laws of God. Ordinance—God's ordinances concerning his worship and service; the singular being put for the plural. Covenant—The covenant made between God and Abraham, and all his posterity, which was everlasting, both on God's part, who, upon the conditions therein expressed, engaged himself to be a God to them and to their seed forever; and on Israel's part, who were obliged thereby to constant and perpetual obedience thro' all generations.
